CHAT.comment: GARY BARTLETT, EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF THE NORTH CAROLINA STATE BOARD OF ELECTIONS, ET AL., Petitioners v. DWIGHT STRICKLAND, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CHRISTOPHER G. BROWNING, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CARL W. THURMAN, III, ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DARYL JOSEFFER ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURAE, SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF CHRISTOPHER G. BROWNING ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:07 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
